statements: DELETE FROM legislative_history WHERE approval_status = FALSE;
DELETE FROM legislative_history WHERE approval_status = TRUE AND enactment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM legislators WHERE id = 1 AND state = 'California';
DELETE FROM policies WHERE enacted_date < '2021-01-01' AND expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM legislative_history WHERE policy_id = 10 AND action = 'approve';
DELETE FROM policy_decisions WHERE impact = 'high' AND decision = 'pass';
